content: I am churning through expressions, and often encounter applications of autoParam, optParam, outParam, for example when traversing typeclass fields which have defaults. I know that Meta.whnf can simplify these expressions and get rid of *Param properly, but it is too powerful for me: I don't want to expand definitions. Do some convenience functions exist for dealing with gadgets?
Max Nowak üê∫ has marked this topic as resolved.
